name: Apollo Silver
description:
Controls: 

WASD to move

Aim with left mouse button

Shoot with right mouse button

Note:

Due to time constraints, I wasn't able to make an attack animation for Silver, but you can still kill the enemies, but Apollo technically shoots past Silver to kill them.

Unfortunately I didn't get to properly add story and dialogue to the game but I hope you enjoy this either way.

This was submitted for my college project.
